summary: Provides classes and utilities to integrate Habana Processing Units (HPU) into the Lightning PyTorch framework, covering accelerator definition, checkpoint serialization, parallel execution strategies, precision handling, and single-device management, plus internal helpers for class and module patching.
business_intent: Enable developers to run deep learning training and inference on Habana HPU hardware within Lightning, simplifying configuration, checkpointing, multi‑device coordination, and mixed‑precision support.
